00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_CONVERT_TRAITS_CHECKING_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_CONVERT_TRAITS_CHECKING_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/apply.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/not.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/static_assert.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/utility/enable_if.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/type_traits/promote.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/type_traits/is_same.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/detail/convert_traits/result.hpp>
00020 
00021 namespace boost{
00022 namespace assign{ 
00023 namespace v2{
00024 namespace ref{
00025 namespace convert_traits{
00026 namespace checking{
00027 
00028     template<typename T1,typename T2,typename T3>
00029     struct tester{
00030     
00031         typedef typename convert_traits::result<T1,T2>::type result_;
00032                 
00033         static void test()
00034         {
00035             typedef boost::is_same<result_,T3> pred_;
00036             BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( pred_::value );
00037         }
00038 
00039    };
00040 
00041 namespace twin_values{
00042 
00043     template<typename T>
00044     void do_check()
00045     {
00046 
00047         tester<const T &, const T &, const T &>::test(); 
00048         tester<const T &,       T &, const T &>::test(); 
00049         tester<      T &, const T &, const T &>::test(); 
00050         tester<      T &,       T &,       T &>::test(); 
00051 
00052         tester<const T &, const T  , const T  >::test(); 
00053         tester<const T &,       T  , const T  >::test(); 
00054         tester<      T &, const T  , const T  >::test(); 
00055         tester<      T &,       T  ,       T  >::test(); 
00056 
00057         tester<const T ,  const T &, const T  >::test(); 
00058         tester<const T ,        T &, const T  >::test(); 
00059         tester<      T ,  const T &, const T  >::test(); 
00060         tester<      T ,        T &,       T  >::test(); 
00061 
00062         tester<const T ,  const T  , const T  >::test(); 
00063         tester<const T ,        T  , const T  >::test(); 
00064         tester<      T ,  const T  , const T  >::test(); 
00065         tester<      T ,        T  ,       T  >::test(); 
00066 
00067     };
00068 
00069 }// twin_values
00070 namespace distinct_values{
00071 namespace arithmetic{
00072 
00073     template<typename T1,typename T2,typename T3>
00074     void do_check_impl(const T1&, const T2& ,const T3&) 
00075     {
00076         
00077         // Disable for Ubuntu 9.1 - GCC 4.4 (see workaround below).
00078         // typedef typename boost::mpl::not_<
00079         //   boost::is_same<T1,T2> 
00080         // >::type not_same_;
00081         // BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(not_same_::value);
00082         
00083         tester<const T1&, const T2&, const T3 >::test(); 
00084         tester<const T1&,       T2&, const T3 >::test(); 
00085         tester<      T1&, const T2&, const T3 >::test(); 
00086         tester<      T1&,       T2&,       T3 >::test(); 
00087 
00088         tester<const T1&, const T2 , const T3 >::test(); 
00089         tester<const T1&,       T2 , const T3 >::test(); 
00090         tester<      T1&, const T2 , const T3 >::test(); 
00091         tester<      T1&,       T2 ,       T3 >::test(); 
00092 
00093         tester<const T1 ,  const T2&, const T3 >::test(); 
00094         tester<const T1 ,        T2&, const T3 >::test(); 
00095         tester<      T1 ,  const T2&, const T3 >::test(); 
00096         tester<      T1 ,        T2&,       T3 >::test(); 
00097 
00098         tester<const T1 ,  const T2 , const T3 >::test(); 
00099         tester<const T1 ,        T2 , const T3 >::test(); 
00100         tester<      T1 ,  const T2 , const T3 >::test(); 
00101         tester<      T1 ,        T2 ,       T3 >::test(); 
00102 
00103     };
00104 
00105 
00106 #define m(T1, T2, T3)                                                                                                       \
00107     template<typename T>                                                                                                        \
00108     void do_check(                                                                                                                      \
00109         typename boost::enable_if<                                                                                      \
00110                 boost::is_same<T,T1>                                                                                    \
00111         >::type* = 0                                                                                                            \
00112     )                                                                                                                                           \
00113     {                                                                                                                                           \
00114         distinct_values::arithmetic::do_check_impl( T1(), T2(), T3() );     \
00115     }                                                                                                                                           \
00116 
00117 
00118 // Works for Max OSX 10.6 GCC 4.2 but not Ubuntu 9.1 GCC 4.4
00119 //      m(short  , long,        int)
00120 //      m(int    , long,        long)
00121 //      m(float  , double,      double)
00122 //  typedef long double long_double_;
00123 //      m(double , long_double_, long double)
00124 
00125 namespace workaround{
00126         typedef boost::numeric::conversion_traits<short, int>::supertype a_;
00127         typedef boost::numeric::conversion_traits<int, long>::supertype b_;
00128         typedef boost::numeric::conversion_traits<float, double>::supertype c_;
00129         typedef boost::numeric::conversion_traits<
00130         double,long double>::supertype d_;
00131 }// workaround
00132 
00133 m(short  , int,         workaround::a_)
00134 m(int    , long,        workaround::b_)
00135 m(float  , double,      workaround::c_)
00136 typedef long double long_double_;
00137 m(double , long_double_, workaround::d_)
00138 
00139 #undef m
00140 }// arithmetic
00141 }// distinct_values
00142 }// checking
00143 }// convert_traits
00144 }// ref
00145 }// v2
00146 }// assign
00147 }// boost
00148 
00149 #endif
